quotes.quote: Some carry the burden of bitterness and resentfulness for many years.
The burden of intelligence: you can always imagine all those wonderful places where you can never belong.
We all have burdens and we need to learn to carry each other's burdens, lighten each other's load.
A diagnosis is burden enough without being burdened by secrecy and shame.
Gratitude is a burden, and every burden is made to be shaken off.
Burdens are the foundations of ease and bitter things the forerunners of pleasure.
Hope is like the sun, which, as we journey toward it, casts the shadow of our burden behind us.
Burdens become light when cheerfully borne.
You only have the burdens on you that you choose to put there.
It has always seemed that a fear of judgment is the mark of guilt and the burden of insecurity.
If God can turn night into day then He can turn your burden into a blessing.
No one is useless in this world who lightens the burden of it to anyone else.
There is no lighter burden, nor more agreeable, than a pen.
Any concern too small to be a prayer is too small to be a burden.
Everyone has his burden. What counts is how you carry it.
It is a burden to be challenged to discover your promise land.
Burdens are for shoulders strong enough to carry them.
The burden which is well borne becomes light.
Life is like unto a long journey with a heavy burden.
Lay the burden at the feet of the Savior.
It's a heavy burden to look up at the mountain and want to start the climb.
Remember, the burden of sorrow is doubled when it is borne alone.
Talk about your blessings more than you talk about your burdens.
The burden of this world is too great for one man to bear, and the world's sorrow too heavy for one heart to suffer.
No burden is so heavy for a man to bear as a succession of happy days.
Sometimes you don't realize the weight of a burden you've been carrying until you feel the weight of its release.
No greater burden can be borne by an individual than to know no one cares or understands.
A prosperous fool is a grievous burden.
Envy is a burden. It is something that makes the heart heavy.
Whenever you're having a burden in your heart, share it to those people whom you trust. It'll make you feel better.
Every burden is a blessing.
Never give up. Never give in. Never become hostile. Hate is too big a burden to bear.
Don't let your mind bully your body into believing it must carry the burden of its worries.
Today's burdens can strengthen you for tomorrow.
